reviews.review_msg: One of the top professors SFU had. But he left. I can't accept that from SFU. He really cared about his students and ensured not only they learn, but they also participate.
During course time every word told can be changed based on circumstances. There is no transparency about grading.

He's great. Assignment wording can be a little confusing at times, but he clarifies quickly through Canvas discussions and/or e-mails. He's always quick to reply and I always feel like his main goal is for us to learn (he doesn't always give you the direct answer, but guides you to it).   Assignments can be a little long though.

I would take any course with Fabio. He relates material well with industry standards and the couple courses I've taken with him were a blast. He makes it clear what he's knowledge he requires for exams and gives clear examples. He's quick to reply online and gives good feedback.
well he is a tough grader now earlier he was easy
He is the sweetest professor at SFU. He is very helpful and shows interest in teaching. Exams are very fair and you can get A+ by attending every class.
very good and nice prof..
so much information in lectures. Will pretty much let you know what to expect in exams. Assignments are time consuming but rewarding. Awesome prof. very helpful and funny.

He's one of the best Prof but he makes the course very easy so if you want to learn more you need to look somewhere else. He's exam are bad on his notes so good for those wanting only good grade. Need to mention all easy & obvious things you assumed else you lose mark.

Pros: cares about students, answers questions posted in Canvas no matter how many questions. Very helpful if you ask for help. Easy exams and assignments  Cons: Some what confusing assignments. Have to read his lectures, not so challenging
A really hardworking professor who tries his best to explain the best he could and gives instant replies via Canvas. Definitely one of the best professors on campus.
Easily one of the best prof's I've ever had in ENSC. Would recommend taking a class with him.
He is the best teacher in my life. Lecture are clear and understandable. Exam  marking is fair. He is always available for help in office hour or during lab time.

HE IS AWESOME! Clear, great great slides, his exams are super fair. Just attend class and ask as many questions as you want! Also, his italian accent makes it even better haha. Take as many classes as you can with him! Great marking schemes

awesome teacher! goes over difficult content in detail, answers questions quickly and fully on the discussion boards. assignments take time, but he is good at spreading it out! totally recommend Fabio!!!
smart and nice
Great professor who is willing to help and readily available to help!

Professor Campi marks very generously and is always compromising with the class. He let us decide how lecture hours would be spent and works VERY hard so that we could easily understand the subject matter. I like how he always says "I'm going to repeat what I just said to help you understand". So kind it's hard to imagine...

HE IS SUPER NICE! He tries his best to teach us and his TAs are very hard working. He also allows us to adapt code online for our assignment.He gives you fast respond on question and take any class with him.You will love engineering!
nice lecturer, very clear on what he expects you to know, truly cares about his students and treats them like they are someone important.
Fabio's a real cool dude and is really open to feedback from students.  You can tell that he genuinely cares about his students.
Fabio is the man

A great teacher. He's very helpful and knowledgeable. He's passionate about the subject and explains materials in detail but sometimes it's hard to follow. He encourages students not to use textbooks and search on Google instead.
He is Great!
